languages.text: Вы убедили Джай Хейдари, что ее обязательство перед Империумом — защитить Меркатум Табула Официале, даже ценой жизни ее подопечных.
You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.
languages.original_text: Вы убедили Джай Хейдари, что ее обязательство перед Империумом — защитить Меркатум Табула Официале, даже ценой жизни ее подопечных.

traits.locale_text: You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.

You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu Jae Heydari que son devoir envers l'Imperium exigeait qu'elle protège la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, même au prix de la vie de ses associés.
languages.original_text: You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu Jae Heydari que son devoir envers l'Imperium exigeait qu'elle protège la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, même au prix de la vie de ses associés.

languages.text: Convenciste a Jae Heydari de que su deber hacia el Imperium era proteger la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, aunque costara la vida de sus socios.
languages.original_text: You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.

traits.locale_text: Convenciste a Jae Heydari de que su deber hacia el Imperium era proteger la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, aunque costara la vida de sus socios.

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリに、仲間の命を犠牲にしてでもメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを守ることが帝国に対する義務であると説得しました。
languages.original_text: You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリに、仲間の命を犠牲にしてでもメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを守ることが帝国に対する義務であると説得しました。

languages.text: 你说服了婕伊·海达利，让她相信帝国官方行商执照是她对帝国的责任，哪怕要牺牲同伴也在所不惜。
languages.original_text: You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.

traits.locale_text: 你说服了婕伊·海达利，让她相信帝国官方行商执照是她对帝国的责任，哪怕要牺牲同伴也在所不惜。

languages.text: Du hast Jae Heydari überzeugt, dass es ihre Pflicht dem Imperium gegenüber ist, das Mercatum Tabula Officiale zu beschützen, selbst wenn es ihre Komplizen das Leben kostet.
languages.original_text: You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.

traits.locale_text: Du hast Jae Heydari überzeugt, dass es ihre Pflicht dem Imperium gegenüber ist, das Mercatum Tabula Officiale zu beschützen, selbst wenn es ihre Komplizen das Leben kostet.

languages.text: Jae Heydari'yi, adamlarının hayatı pahasına da olsa Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi korumanın İmparatorluk'a karşı vazifesi olduğuna ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: You convinced Jae Heydari that it was her duty to the Imperium to protect the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, even at the cost of her associates' lives.
